channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

item.title: [GRA][BHS] [Data logs] Index backend migration
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 15, 12:00 - 15:00 UTC

Apr 15, 00:08 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/06/2022 12:00 UTC
End time : 15/06/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : No downtime expected in term of log ingestion, but ES API will not be available for a maximum time of two hours.
Service improvement: The indexation backend of Logs Data Platform will be replaced from Elasticsearch to OpenSearch.
Kibana instances will be replaced by OpenSearch Dashboards ones.

APIv6 calls related to ElasticSearch backend will be automatically redirected to new OpenSearch backend and will remain available until September 2022.

The following documentation : https://docs.ovh.com/fr/logs-data-platform/ will be updated few days before the migration.

item.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - E103C08
item.description:
Apr 21, 10:56 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 21, 09:03 UTC
Update - Update : The replacement of the network equipment is still in progress.

Apr 21, 07:35 UTC
Identified - Start time : 21/04/2022 07:23 UTC
Service impact : vRack network is unavailable.
Root cause : 5 ports on switch are defective.
Ongoing actions : We are working to replace the switch ASAP, during the maintenance there will be a down for all the rack

item.title: [BHS7][VRACK] bhs7-sdtor93b-n93 (B710A13)
item.description:
Apr 21, 10:44 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Apr 21, 10:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 14, 22:01 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/04/2022 10:00 UTC
End time : 21/04/2022 12:00 UTC
Service impact : 2 hours downtime during replacement.
Service improvement : We will perform a replacement of the public and vRack devices due to down ports.

item.title: [RBX7][Dedicated Servers] - R715A13/R715A14/R715A16/R715A17
item.description:
Apr 21, 04:52 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 20/04/2022 12:12 UTC
End Time : 21/04/2022 00:50 UTC
Comment : All servers affected by the incident are available and stable. We are closing the incident.

Apr 21, 01:05 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 20/04/2022 12:12 UTC
Service impact : Both public and private network are reachable for all racks that were impacted by this incident.
Root cause : A malfunction on the cooling system
Ongoing actions : After the interventions made by our teams, all servers are operational again. However, these servers will remain under monitoring until 04:00 UTC.

Apr 21, 00:14 UTC
Update - Update : Only 3 servers remain unreachable. Our teams still working on them to restore the service.

Apr 20, 22:28 UTC
Update - Update : Only 8 servers remain down.
Our teams are continuing to work on this incident to restore the service quickly.

Apr 20, 20:32 UTC
Update - 95% of the servers are reachable.
Our teams are still working to solve the problem.

Apr 20, 17:48 UTC
Update - The cooling system is back in place.
Our teams are currently putting back progressively the servers into service.

Apr 20, 14:59 UTC
Update - Due to a malfunction on the cooling system, the racks R715A16 and R715A17 are currently unavailable.
The technical teams estimate that the cooling system will be back in service within 1H30.
From there, the servers will be progressively brought back into service.
We apologize for the inconvenience caused

Apr 20, 14:31 UTC
Update - All the servers of rack R715A14 and R715A13 are up and running.
Our teams are currently working on the other racks which are as follow: R715A16 and R715A17.
Servers of rack R715A17 are verified by our teams and seems to have a limited impact.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding

Apr 20, 13:34 UTC
Update - R715A15 rack is functional
Rack R715A14 and R715A13 are being restored (75% of the servers are working again)
Rack R715A16 and R715A17 must be fully checked by our technical teams. If the servers are intact, they will be put back into service.
In case of hardware failure, the hardware will be replaced. Due to the integral check, the return to service of the servers can take some time. We will inform you as soon as we have more visibility on the status of these two racks.

Apr 20, 12:33 UTC
Update - Update :Private and public network are also unreachable for R715A14 and R715A13.
We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Apr 20, 12:27 UTC
Identified - Start time : 20/04/2022 12:12 UTC
Service impact : Both public and private network are unreachable for R715A16 and R715A17.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem.
